title: Will MODI be considered as demagogue in the future?
selftext:
So I was reading Wikipedia page about demagogue. I mean some of the things written there sync so much with what our government is doing.

https://www.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demagogue

So will this regime be considered as demagoguery in the future?
cleaned_text: modi considered demagogue future reading wikipedia page demagogue mean things written sync much government regime considered demagoguery future
